file.name: adminroles.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  version: 0.0.1
  title: '@viron/lib admin roles'
  description: admin roles api specifications
  x-pages:
    - id: vironAdminRoles
      group: 管理画面/管理
      title: Viron 管理ロール
      description: |
        # 管理ロール一覧の管理
        管理ロールデータの **作成・更新・削除** を行います。
      contents:
        - title: 管理ロール
          operationId: listVironAdminRoles
          type: table
          resourceId: vironAdminRole

tags:
  - name: vironAdminRoles

paths:
  /viron/adminroles:
    get:
      operationId: listVironAdminRoles
      tags:
        - vironAdminRole
      summary: list admin roles
      description: 管理ロール一覧
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRoleListWithPager'
      security:
        - jwt: []
    post:
      operationId: createVironAdminRole
      tags:
        - vironAdminRole
      summary: create an admin role
      description: 管理ロール作成
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRoleCreatePayload'
      responses:
        201:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRole'
      security:
        - jwt: []

  /viron/adminroles/{id}:
    put:
      operationId: updateVironAdminRole
      tags:
        - vironAdminRole
      summary: update an admin role
      description: 管理ロール更新
      parameters:
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/VironIdPathParam'
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRoleUpdatePayload'
      responses:
        204:
          description: OK
      security:
        - jwt: []
    delete:
      operationId: removeVironAdminRole
      tags:
        - vironAdminRole
      summary: delete an admin role
      description: 管理ロール削除
      parameters:
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/VironIdPathParam'
      responses:
        204:
          description: OK
      security:
        - jwt: []

  /viron/resource_ids:
    get:
      operationId: listVironResourceIds
      tags:
        - vironAdminRole
      summary: list admin resource ids
      description: リソースID一覧(enum用)
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: './components.yaml#/components/responses/VironXEnumResponse'
      security:
        - jwt: []

components:
  schemas:
    VironAdminRoleListWithPager:
      allOf:
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/schemas/VironPager'
        - type: object
          properties:
            list:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRoleList'
          required:
            - list

    VironAdminRoleList:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRole'

    VironAdminRole:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          description: ロールID
          type: string
        permissions:
          description: 権限
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRolePermission'
      required:
        - id
        - permissions

    VironAdminRolePermission:
      type: object
      properties:
        resourceId:
          type: string
          x-enum:
            operationId: listVironResourceIds
        permission:
          type: string
          enum:
            - read
            - write
            - all
            - deny
      required:
        - resourceId
        - permission

    VironAdminRoleCreatePayload:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          description: ロールID
          type: string
        permissions:
          description: 権限
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRolePermission'
      required:
        - id
        - permissions

    VironAdminRoleUpdatePayload:
      type: object
      properties:
        permissions:
          description: 権限
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRolePermission'
      required:
        - permissions

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /viron/adminroles: get: operation "listVironAdminRoles": responses: 200: content: "application/json": schema: parse schema: resolve "#/components/schemas/VironAdminRoleListWithPager": parse schema: allOf: [0]: parse schema: resolve "./components.yaml#/components/schemas/VironPager": find schema: external base "./components.yaml" is not supported
